say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %}

We can use this function to say hell to someone.

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Jenna")

'Hello Jenna!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Amy")=="Hello Amy!"
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
o = HelloSayer("Jenna")
o.say()

'Hello Jenna!'
{% endraw %}
